changelog:
* Add a loading animation when loading images for the first time to reduce the tedium of waiting during the first load
* Now click on Tab to go back to the top and a small vibration will occur
* Add over scale rebound animation when the list cannot be further zoomed

---

* 新增 初次加载图片时显示加载动画，减少初次加载过程中等待的乏味感
* 现在点击 Tab 能够回到顶部，并且会发生微小的振动
* 新增 当列表无法进一步缩放时，显示过度回弹动画
